content: tm techno hat techno a free knitting pattern by blue sky alpacas techno hat designed by colleen powley experience level hat advanced beginner with smaller ndl co 96 sts place marker and join in round being careful materials not to twist sts blue sky alpacas techno 50g/120yds next round *k2 p2 repeat from * to end 1 hank repeat last round 9 times 10 row of rib size 8 5 mm 16 circular needle pattern or size needed to obtain gauge size 10 5 6 5 mm 16 circular needle change to larger ndls or size needed to obtain gauge smocking stitch section size 10 5 6 5 mm double pointed round 1 *smk k1 p2 k2 p2 repeat needles or size needed to obtain gauge from * to end tapestry needle rnds 2-5 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end photo shown aquarius #1977 round 6 k2 p2 *smk k1 p2 ** k2 p2 repeat from * 10 times then from * to ** once finished measurements rnds 7-10 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end brim circumference is 17 unstretched round 11 *smk k1 p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end gauge 4 sts = 1 in stockinette stitch rib section with larger needle next round *k2 p2 repeat from * to end needle size required may vary depending repeat last round 7 times 8 row of rib pattern on color of techno chosen please check your gauge crown round 1 decrease *k6 k2tog repeat from * special abbreviations around 84 sts bobble bind off round 2 & all even rnds work even co cast on round 3 decrease *k5 k2tog repeat k knit from * around 72 sts ndl s needle s round 5 decrease *k4 k2tog repeat p purl from * around 60 sts rem remaining round 7 decrease *k3 k2tog repeat repeat repeat from * around 48 sts round s round s round 9 decrease *k2 k2tog repeat rs right side from * around 36 sts smk work smocking stitch round 11 decrease *k1 k2tog repeat st s stitch es from * around 24 sts ws wrong side round 13 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around 12 sts smocking stitch round 14 knit starting with yarn in the back put the right hand needle between the 6th finishing and 7th stitches on the left hand needle cut yarn and draw end through rem sts insert the needle between the stitches knitwise pull up a loop and place on weave in ends block your left hand needle fairly tightly knit this loop and the first stitch on the left hand needle together find this and other free patterns at blueskyalpacas com p o box 88 cedar mn 55011 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 050611
